sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>false</active>
        <api_name>global.RAGColoronTask</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RAGColoronTask</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RAGColoronTask = Class.create();
RAGColoronTask.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    Overdue: function(dueDate, tskStat) {

        gs.addInfoMessage('RAG');
        var taskDueDate = dueDate.getNumericValue();
        var currDate = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue();
        var dateDiff = taskDueDate - currDate;
        gs.addInfoMessage("dateDiff:" + dateDiff);
        if ((dateDiff > 0 && dateDiff < 900000) && ((tskStat == '1') || (tskStat == '2') || (tskStat == '8'))) {
            gs.addInfoMessage('1');
            tradeTsk.due_date_status = 'Approaching';
            tradeTsk.update();
			return 'Approaching';
        }

    },


    type: 'RAGColoronTask'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-04-30 13:02:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>400d88031b75c694ff37eb14b24bcb96</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RAGColoronTask</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a58cfda01bcb6910ff37eb14b24bcb18</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a58cfda01bcb6910ff37eb14b24bcb18</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_400d88031b75c694ff37eb14b24bcb96</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-05-02 07:11:47</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
